segment.tokens: “ Buster always treats me very politely
even Farmer Brown boy ” spoke up Happy Jack Squirrel
why is everybody of Jimmy Skunk
“ They are of that little scent gun he carries
I had one just like it
Old Mother Nature shook her head
Peter to trust you with a gun like Jimmy Skunk 's , ” said she
If you had a scent gun like Jimmy 's
there would be in the Green Forest on the Green Meadow all the time
that you would drive everybody else away
He never uses that little scent gun
unless he is in real danger
that not one of you has seen
Jimmy use that little scent gun ”
Peter looked at Jumper the Hare
Jack looked at Danny Meadow Mouse
Johnny looked at Whitefoot the Wood Mouse
Then all looked at Old Mother Nature
“ Jimmy is wonderfully well for defense only
He never makes the mistake misusing that little scent gun
what more do you know about Jimmy
just because I do n't hurry
I do n't have to hurry
I never can see any good in hurrying when one does n't have to . ”
when one does n't have to
“ He is of the best-natured people I know
it is a lucky for the rest of us that he is
the rest of us he is
In fact I do n't think
what you would call really thin
excepting very early in the spring
He eats Beetles grubs Grasshoppers Crickets insects of all sorts
he catches members of my family
I never feel safe with Jimmy Skunk very near ”
Jimmy did n't look at all put out
“ tender Mouse is rather to my liking and then or a Lizard a fish ”
that I also enjoy a Frog now
that young birds do n't come amiss
“ That 's a of the pot calling the kettle black
he Chatterer made a face at him
that Chatterer had robbed many a nest of young birds
that all you know about Jimmy ? ”
asked Old Mother Nature of Peter
that he lives in a hole in the ground
I seldom see him out in winter
he sleeps all winter the same ”
“ I sleep a lot during the winter
I do n't go into winter quarters
I do n't sleep the way
I go out in winter and hunt around a little
Not when I can help myself
I would much rather use one of Johnny Chuck 's old houses
